entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
